verses.name: Deuteronomy 1:35
verses.text: Surely there shall not one of these men of this evil generation see that good land, which I sware to give unto your fathers,

verses.name: Deuteronomy 1:36
verses.text: Save Caleb the son of Jephunneh; he shall see it, and to him will I give the land that he hath trodden upon, and to his children, because he hath wholly followed the Lord.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 1:37
verses.text: Also the Lord was angry with me for your sakes, saying, Thou also shalt not go in thither.
